title: Installation issue: Gunrock
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

At first glance this doesn't seem to be a Spack issue, but just in case I will report it here, and  contact Gunrock developers soon.

```console
$ spack install gunrock
...
Unable to checkout '5be4ef286d25cb1ac548f33dc113ad93792c9adb' in submodule path 'docs'
==> [2020-07-01-20:53:04.897438, 18270] Fetching from [git] https://github.com/gunrock/gunrock.git at tag v1.1 failed.
==> [2020-07-01-20:53:04.897568, 18270] ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/usr/bin/git' 'submodule' 'update' '--init' '--recursive'
==> [2020-07-01-20:53:04.905195, 18232] Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for spack-stage-gunrock-1.1-ck6pm5v6f6dy4qkbzar7b4imwmc5izw2

/mnt/local/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1148, in do_fetch:
       1145                raise FetchError("Will not fetch %s" %
       1146                                 self.spec.format('{name}{@version}'), ck_msg)
       1147
  >>   1148        self.stage.create()
       1149        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only)
       1150        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1151
```

### Information on your system

The error is system independent

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.15.0-11-c81d57c
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-skylake
```

### Additional information

A  longer debug output is:
```
==> [2020-07-01-20:52:43.328474, 18270] Cloning git repository: https://github.com/gunrock/gunrock.git at tag v1.1

Cloning into 'gunrock'...

You are in 'detached HEAD' state. You can look around, make experimental
changes and commit them, and you can discard any commits you make in this
state without impacting any branches by performing another checkout.

If you want to create a new branch to retain commits you create, you may

  git checkout -b new_branch_name

==> [2020-07-01-20:53:04.905195, 18232] Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for spack-stage-gunrock-1.1-ck6pm5v6f6dy4qkbzar7b4imwmc5izw2

/mnt/local/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1148, in do_fetch:
       1145                raise FetchError("Will not fetch %s" %
       1146                                 self.spec.format('{name}{@version}'), ck_msg)
       1147
  >>   1148        self.stage.create()
       1149        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only)
```

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [ ] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [ ] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
